creator: shivaji.dutta@accenture.com
text:
<!-- Construct compile classpath -->
  <path id="site2.classpath">
    <fileset dir="${jakarta-site2}/lib">
      <include name="*.jar"/>
    </fileset>
  </path>

The build fails because the {jakarta-site2} has not been defined in the Build 
file.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
${jakarta-site2} is specified within build.properties, not build.xml. Please 
also see build.properties.sample.

The comment in build.xml is wrong. It should read
  "Construct classpath for building the html pages"
instead of 
  " Construct compile classpath"

${site2.classpath} is not needed for compiling the log4j classes. I have 
corrected this bug in our CVS repository.
